markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Diamond Fists](/Feats.aspx?ID=6043) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=656" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 127 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

Your body hardens as you combine your attacks, making your finishing blows more damaging. Your unarmed attacks gain the [forceful](/Traits.aspx?ID=611) and [deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=570) traits. Any that already had one or both of these traits increase their weapon damage dice by one step.
name: Diamond Fists

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 18" pfs="Standard" > Diamond Fists Source Player Core 2 pg. 127 1.1 --- Your body hardens as you combine your attacks, making your finishing blows more damaging. Your unarmed attacks gain the forceful and deadly d10 traits. Any that already had one or both of these traits increase their weapon damage dice by one step.
